MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the  CH3  postcode area of Chester, affecting properties in Filkins Lane, Broughton Hall Avenue, Pearl Lane and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at  9:46PM. Our engineers have arrived on site and confirmed the power cut has been caused by a fault on the electrical cable network. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by Midnight. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:29PM on 23rd October 2020.
